instruction: Patient reports improved blood sugar levels since starting empagliflozin but experiences increased thirst as a side effect. The patient finds it tricky to maintain the dosing schedule due to irregular work hours and sometimes forgets to take the medication when on the road early.

attributes.narrative: Patient reports improved blood sugar levels since starting empagliflozin but experiences increased thirst as a side effect. The patient finds it tricky to maintain the dosing schedule due to irregular work hours and sometimes forgets to take the medication when on the road early.

instruction: The clinician suggested using an app or setting an alarm on the phone to help remember the medication dosing schedule.

coding.display: Patient given telephone advice out of hours

attributes.comment: The clinician suggested using an app or setting an alarm on the phone to help remember the medication dosing schedule.
